title: BHP and Rio Tinto to Collaborate on Iron Ore Project in Pilbara
description: BHP Group and Rio Tinto Group, the world’s two biggest mining companies, will join forces to extract 200 million tons of iron ore in the Pilbara region of Western Australia.
content: BHP Group and Rio Tinto Group, the world’s two biggest mining companies, will join forces to extract 200 million tons of iron ore in the Pilbara region of Western Australia.
